    • Method Detail

      • cloneOnNewNode

        public LsaStandardCondition cloneOnNewNode(INode<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> n)
        Description copied from interface: ICondition
        This method allows to clone this action on a new node. It may result useful to support runtime creation of nodes with the same reaction programming, e.g. for morphogenesis.
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface ICondition<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in interface ILsaCondition
        Specified by:
        cloneOnNewNode in class LsaAbstractCondition
        Parameters:
        n - The node where to clone this IAction
        Returns:
        the cloned action

      • filter

        public boolean filter(List<Map<FasterString,ITreeNode<?>>> matchesList,
                      List<? extends ILsaNode> validNodes,
                      List<Map<ILsaNode,List<ILsaMolecule>>> retrieved)
        Description copied from interface: ILsaCondition
        When this method is called, the condition must filter the current matches and allowed nodes.
        Parameters:
        matchesList - current matches. This map may be modified
        validNodes - the list of the valid neighbors. This list may be modified
        retrieved - the list of the the molecules removed for each node for each possible binding
        Returns:
        true if the condition is valid, false otherwise

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()
        Returns:
        The context for this condition.

      • getMolecule

        protected ILsaMolecule getMolecule()
        Returns:
        the molecule template whose presence is tested by this condition

      • getPropensityConditioning

        public double getPropensityConditioning()
        Description copied from interface: ICondition
        This method is a support for the propensity calculation inside the Reactions. It allows this condition to influence the rate calculation in some way. It's up to the reaction to decide whether to use or not this information, and how.
        Returns:
        how this condition may influence the propensity.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        true if the condition is satisfied in current environment.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the value which is passed.
